languages.text: "Среди нас нет грешников". {n}Пронзительный голос, льющийся из вокс-синтезатора, ошеломляет сильнее, чем оглушительный рев Тарзуса.{/n} "Технобрат Тарзус и дух машины, живший в его боевой упряжи, стали жертвами охватывавшего их страдания. Они судили поспешно и неверно. Теперь их страсти окончены. Я объявляю их мучениками и реквизирую {g|Encyclopedia:Augmentation}нейроаугмент{/g} Тарзуса Ханейманна для сохранения его блаженной памяти".

traits.locale_text: "Среди нас нет грешников". {n}Пронзительный голос, льющийся из вокс-синтезатора, ошеломляет сильнее, чем оглушительный рев Тарзуса.{/n} "Технобрат Тарзус и дух машины, живший в его боевой упряжи, стали жертвами охватывавшего их страдания. Они судили поспешно и неверно. Теперь их страсти окончены. Я объявляю их мучениками и реквизирую {g|Encyclopedia:Augmentation}нейро-аугмент{/g} Тарзуса Ханейманна для сохранения его блаженной памяти".
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.text: "There are no apostates among us." {n}The piercing voice from the vox-synth is more overwhelming than Tarzus's thunderous roar:{/n} "Tech-Brother Tarzus and the machine spirit that lived in his battle harness succumbed to the suffering that beset them. Their judgement was rash and erroneous. Now their torment is over. I declare them martyrs, and am requisitioning Tarzus Haneumann's {g|Encyclopedia:Augmentation}neural augmetic{/g} for the purposes of preserving his blessed memory."
languages.original_text: "Среди нас нет грешников". {n}Пронзительный голос, льющийся из вокс-синтезатора, ошеломляет сильнее, чем оглушительный рев Тарзуса.{/n} "Технобрат Тарзус и дух машины, живший в его боевой упряжи, стали жертвами охватывавшего их страдания. Они судили поспешно и неверно. Теперь их страсти окончены. Я объявляю их мучениками и реквизирую {g|Encyclopedia:Augmentation}нейроаугмент{/g} Тарзуса Ханейманна для сохранения его блаженной памяти".

Their judgement was rash and erroneous. Now their torment is over. Their judgement was rash and erroneous. Now their torment is over. I declare them martyrs, and am requisitioning Tarzus Haneumann's {g|Encyclopedia:Augmentation}neural augmetic{/g} for the purposes of preserving his blessed memory."
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.text: 「我々の中に背教者はいません」{n}ヴォクス・シンセからの鋭い声はターザスの雷のような大声よりも圧倒的であった。{/n}「技術同胞ターザス、そして彼の戦闘ハーネスに住んでいる機械精霊は彼らを取り巻く苦痛に屈服しました。彼らの判断は無謀で非道なものだった。今、彼らの苦悩は終わりました。自分は彼らが殉教者だと宣言し、彼の祝福されし記憶を保存するべく、ターザス・ヘニュマンの{g|Encyclopedia:Augmentation}神経オーグメティック{/g}の引渡しを要求します」
languages.original_text: "There are no apostates among us." {n}The piercing voice from the vox-synth is more overwhelming than Tarzus's thunderous roar:{/n} "Tech-Brother Tarzus and the machine spirit that lived in his battle harness succumbed to the suffering that beset them. Their judgement was rash and erroneous. Now their torment is over. I declare them martyrs, and am requisitioning Tarzus Haneumann's {g|Encyclopedia:Augmentation}neural augmetic{/g} for the purposes of preserving his blessed memory."

traits.locale_text: 「我々の中に背教者はいません」{n}ヴォクス・シンセからの鋭い声はターザスの雷のような大声よりも圧倒的であった。{/n}「技術同胞ターザス、そして彼の戦闘ハーネスに住んでいる機械精霊は彼らを取り巻く苦痛に屈服しました。彼らの判断は無謀で非道なものだった。今、彼らの苦悩は終わりました。自分は彼らが殉教者だと宣言し、彼の祝福されし記憶を保存するべく、ターザス・ヘニュマンの{g|Encyclopedia:Augmentation}神経オーグメティック{/g}の引渡しを要求します」
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.text: “我们之中根本没有叛徒。”{n}帕斯卡的音阵合成器传来了尖锐的声音，比塔祖斯雷鸣般的咆哮更加令人无法忍受。{/n}“技术兄弟塔祖斯以及他的战斗装备中的机魂被困难所侵扰，因而草率地做出了错误判断。如今，他们的痛苦已经结束了，我在此宣布他们为殉道者，并要求保留塔祖斯·哈努曼的{g|Encyclopedia:Augmentation}神经植入物{/g}，用以保存他的神圣记忆。”
languages.original_text: "There are no apostates among us." {n}The piercing voice from the vox-synth is more overwhelming than Tarzus's thunderous roar:{/n} "Tech-Brother Tarzus and the machine spirit that lived in his battle harness succumbed to the suffering that beset them. Their judgement was rash and erroneous. Now their torment is over. I declare them martyrs, and am requisitioning Tarzus Haneumann's {g|Encyclopedia:Augmentation}neural augmetic{/g} for the purposes of preserving his blessed memory."

traits.locale_text: “我们之中根本没有叛徒。”{n}帕斯卡的音阵合成器传来了尖锐的声音，比塔祖斯雷鸣般的咆哮更加令人无法忍受。{/n}“技术兄弟塔祖斯以及他的战斗装备中的机魂被困难所侵扰，因而草率地做出了错误判断。如今，他们的痛苦已经结束了，我在此宣布他们为殉道者，并要求保留塔祖斯·哈努曼的{g|Encyclopedia:Augmentation}神经植入物{/g}，用以保存他的神圣记忆。”
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.text: "Unter uns gibt es keine Apostaten." {n}Die durchdringende Stimme aus dem Vox-Synth ist überwältigender als Tarzus' donnerndes Gebrüll.{/n} "Tech-Bruder Tarzus und der Maschinengeist, der in seiner Kampfpanzerung lebte, erlagen dem Leid, das sie ergriffen hatte. Ihr Urteil war voreilig und fehlerhaft. Jetzt ist ihre Qual vorbei. Ich erkläre sie zu Märtyrern und requiriere Tarzus Haneumanns {g|Encyclopedia:Augmentation}neurale Augmentation{/g} zur Erhaltung seines gesegneten Gedächtnisses."
languages.original_text: "There are no apostates among us." {n}The piercing voice from the vox-synth is more overwhelming than Tarzus's thunderous roar:{/n} "Tech-Brother Tarzus and the machine spirit that lived in his battle harness succumbed to the suffering that beset them. Their judgement was rash and erroneous. Now their torment is over. I declare them martyrs, and am requisitioning Tarzus Haneumann's {g|Encyclopedia:Augmentation}neural augmetic{/g} for the purposes of preserving his blessed memory."

traits.locale_text: "Unter uns gibt es keine Apostaten." {n}Die durchdringende Stimme aus dem Vox-Synth ist überwältigender als Tarzus' donnerndes Gebrüll.{/n} "Tech-Bruder Tarzus und der Maschinengeist, der in seiner Kampfpanzerung lebte, erlagen dem Leid, das sie ergriffen hatte. Ihr Urteil war voreilig und fehlerhaft. Jetzt ist ihre Qual vorbei. Ich erkläre sie zu Märtyrern und requiriere Tarzus Haneumanns {g|Encyclopedia:Augmentation}neurale Augmentation{/g} zur Erhaltung seines gesegneten Gedächtnisses."
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.text: « Il n'y a pas d'apostat parmi nous. » {n}La voix stridente émanant du synthétiseur-vox est plus accablante encore que les rugissements tonitruants de Tarzus.{/n} « Le technofrère Tarzus et l'esprit de la machine qui habitait son harnois ont succombé aux tourments qui les accablaient. Leur jugement était irréfléchi et erroné. À présent, leur calvaire est terminé. Je les déclare officiellement martyrs et je réquisitionne l'{g|Encyclopedia:Augmentation}augmétique neural{/g} de Tarzus Haneumann afin de préserver son auguste mémoire. »
languages.original_text: "There are no apostates among us." {n}The piercing voice from the vox-synth is more overwhelming than Tarzus's thunderous roar:{/n} "Tech-Brother Tarzus and the machine spirit that lived in his battle harness succumbed to the suffering that beset them. Their judgement was rash and erroneous. Now their torment is over. I declare them martyrs, and am requisitioning Tarzus Haneumann's {g|Encyclopedia:Augmentation}neural augmetic{/g} for the purposes of preserving his blessed memory."

traits.locale_text: « Il n'y a pas d'apostat parmi nous. » {n}La voix stridente émanant du synthétiseur-vox est plus accablante encore que les rugissements tonitruants de Tarzus.{/n} « Le technofrère Tarzus et l'esprit de la machine qui habitait son harnois ont succombé aux tourments qui les accablaient. Leur jugement était irréfléchi et erroné. À présent, leur calvaire est terminé. Je les déclare officiellement martyrs et je réquisitionne l'{g|Encyclopedia:Augmentation}augmétique neural{/g} de Tarzus Haneumann afin de préserver son auguste mémoire. »
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.text: «No hay apóstatas entre nosotros». {n}La penetrante voz que sale del voco sintetizador resulta más imponente que el atronador rugido de Tarzus.{/n} «El tecnohermano Tarzus y el espíritu máquina que habitaba en su arnés de combate sucumbieron al tormento que les afligía. Su criterio fue precipitado y erróneo. Ahora su tormento ha terminado. Yo los declaro mártires, y requiso el {g|Encyclopedia:Augmentation}aumético neural{/g} de Tarzus Haneumann a fin de preservar su bendita memoria».
languages.original_text: "There are no apostates among us." {n}The piercing voice from the vox-synth is more overwhelming than Tarzus's thunderous roar:{/n} "Tech-Brother Tarzus and the machine spirit that lived in his battle harness succumbed to the suffering that beset them. Their judgement was rash and erroneous. Now their torment is over. I declare them martyrs, and am requisitioning Tarzus Haneumann's {g|Encyclopedia:Augmentation}neural augmetic{/g} for the purposes of preserving his blessed memory."

traits.locale_text: «No hay apóstatas entre nosotros». {n}La penetrante voz que sale del vocosintetizador resulta más imponente que el atronador rugido de Tarzus.{/n} «El tecnohermano Tarzus y el espíritu máquina que habitaba en su arnés de combate sucumbieron al tormento que les afligía. Su criterio fue precipitado y erróneo. Ahora su tormento ha terminado. Yo los declaro mártires, y requiso el {g|Encyclopedia:Augmentation}aumético neural{/g} de Tarzus Haneumann a fin de preservar su bendita memoria».
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.text: "Aramızda sapkın bulunmuyor." {n}Voks sentezleyiciden gelen delici ses, Tarzus'un gürleyen kükremesinden bile baskın çıkıyor.{/n} "Tekno Kardeş Tarzus ve savaş giysisinde yaşayan makine ruhu, onları kuşatan acıya yenik düştüler. Hükümleri aceleciydi, hatalıydı. Izdırapları son buldu. Onları şehit ilan ediyor ve kutsanmış hatırasını korumak amacıyla Tarzus Haneumann'ın {g|Encyclopedia:Augmentation}sinirsel ogmetiğine{/g} el koyuyorum."
languages.original_text: "There are no apostates among us." {n}The piercing voice from the vox-synth is more overwhelming than Tarzus's thunderous roar:{/n} "Tech-Brother Tarzus and the machine spirit that lived in his battle harness succumbed to the suffering that beset them. Their judgement was rash and erroneous. Now their torment is over. I declare them martyrs, and am requisitioning Tarzus Haneumann's {g|Encyclopedia:Augmentation}neural augmetic{/g} for the purposes of preserving his blessed memory."

traits.locale_text: "Aramızda sapkın bir kimse bulunmuyor." {n}Voks sentezleyiciden çıkan delici ses, Tarzus'un gürleyen kükremesinden daha bile baskın:{/n} "Tekno Kardeş Tarzus ve savaş giysisinde yaşayan makine ruhu, onları kuşatan acıya yenik düştüler. Hükümleri aceleciydi ve hatalıydı. Izdırapları artık son buldu. Onları şehit ilan ediyorum ve kutsanmış hatırasını koruma amacıyla Tarzus Haneumann'ın {g|Encyclopedia:Augmentation}sinirsel ogmetiğine{/g} el koyuyorum."
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion
